name: Totter Box
description:
Keep your platform balanced and don't totter while you collect shiny coins and gems!

Features :

▸ Cute music!

▸ Various handcrafted levels!

▸ Tricky maze!

▸ Cute characters!

▸ Gems to spend in shop!

▸ Colorful environment!

▸ Dance performance when you win!

2nd Place Winner for Buildbox HyperCasual GameJam sponsored by Kwalee.
